0.title: Videoclip
0.plot: Fitpiet and Kokpiet sing a longer version of the opening song.

1.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 1
1.plot: Although he is not allowed to go with him Jonas follows his grandpa to the secret castle of saint Nicolas. While hiding in the castle he sees a villain sabotaging the gifts machine.

2.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 2
2.plot: Fitpiet finds a boat in the water which means there is another person in the castle. The Pieten, however, find no one.

3.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 3
3.plot: Frits unleashes his centuries old grandfather from a mysterious book. Now back alive Ferdinand The First will take revenge on the man who locked him away in the book: saint Nicolas.

4.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 4
4.plot: Ferdinand orders Frits to make Frits' secret servant place a centuries old bomb in the gifts machine. The machine is blown to smithereens.

5.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 5
5.plot: Jonas opens the prism holder which releases the prism back in time to the past. The secret servant of Frits is revealed to be Tuinman, the gardener of saint Nicolas.

6.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 6
6.plot: Hoofdpiet and Jonas enter the time hole and are suddenly in a very distant past. They see a villain terrorizing children outside the ancient castle.

7.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 7
7.plot: By placing the robe, the scepter, the book and the crown of saint Nicolas in the center of the castle hall four statues come alive.

8.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 8
8.plot: Frits locks saint Nicolas and Grandpa in the room of the saint. Hoofdpiet and Jonas, now in the past, try to obtain the artifacts needed to create a new prism.

9.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 9
9.plot: Kaat helps Hoofdpiet and Jonas escape from the evil henchmen. She, however, risking her stay, also mentions she is the daughter of Tuinman.

10.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 10
10.plot: Fitpiet and Kokpiet are locked in a chamber. By disguising themselves Jonas and Kaat manage to obtain two additional items of Ferdinand I.

11.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 11
11.plot: Jonas and Kaat try to distract the henchmen to clear the entrance of the castle.

12.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 12
12.plot: The plan to create a new prism fails when Grandpa forgets to place the book.

13.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 13
13.plot: Hoofdpiet and Kaat are imprisoned by Ferdinand I and his henchmen.

14.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 14
14.plot: Hoofdpiet, Jonas and Kaat try to trick Ferdinand I to take the four artifacts and place them in the center of the hall himself.

15.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 15
15.plot: The friends succeed in creating the prism. But it is only created in the past which means Hoofdpiet, Jonas and Kaat have to bring it to the present.

16.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 16
16.plot: Ferdinand I closes the entrance to the present by creating an eternal fire. This imprisons Hoofdpiet and Kaat in the past.

17.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 17
17.plot: Hoofdpiet and Kaat find out that eternal fire can be extinguished with eternal rain.

18.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 18
18.plot: Frits and Ferdinand I have Tuinman back on their side.

19.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 19
19.plot: Jonas, Grandpa and saint Nicolas try to ambush Frits but he manages to escape. Fitpiet and Kokpiet lock Tuinman up and stand guard.

20.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 20
20.plot: Tuinman manages to escape. When he tries to save saint Nicolas he finds out his trust is severely damaged.

21.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 21
21.plot: Ferdinand I creates a potion to change humans into frogs but his plan backlashes.

22.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 22
22.plot: When saving Kaat, Hoofdpiet manages to separate Ferdinand I from Frits.

23.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 23
23.plot: Frits leaves a note claiming he will leave the saint alone from now on. Tuinman knows for sure this is a lie and meant as a diversion.

24.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 24
24.plot: Frits uses the prism to release Ferdinand I from his book.

25.title: Het Mysterie van de Pakjesmachine: Part 25
25.plot: Ferdinand I and Frits are locked in the book and the Evening of the Presents can take place.

1.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 1
1.plot: It is December 5th, Evening of the Presents. Joy and her little sister have to spent the family holiday without their mother.

2.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 2
2.plot: Ferdinand I, now back alive, takes over the castle again.

3.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 3
3.plot: Hoofdpiet succeeds in escaping from the castle with Ferdinand's book.

4.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 4
4.plot: Grandpa and Jonas start working on a machine that can freeze time. Freezing time creates enough time to save the Evening of the Presents.

5.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 5
5.plot: Jonas, Swingpiet and Gadgetpiet sneak into the castle while keeping the saint up to date about their status.

6.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 6
6.plot: When trying to help his love crush, the aunt of Robin, Kokpiet accidentally demolishes the time freeze machine.

7.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 7
7.plot: While the castle and the Pieten are still kept hostage by Ferdinand I, saint Nicolas suffers of fatigue.

8.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 8
8.plot: The aunt of Robin almost gives in to the seductions of Kokpiet, but lets her decision be influenced by the battle of Ferdinand I.

9.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 9
9.plot: With the teleportation tree damaged no one will be able to enter the realm of Slot Marsepeinstein anymore.

10.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 10
10.plot: Ferdinand I lets the saint be captured in a box to be banished to Siberia.

11.title: Pakjes in Gevaar: Part 11
11.plot: Robin saves the Evening of the Presents by luring Ferdinand I to the magic chimney and banishing him to Siberia.

12.title: De Zak is Zoek
12.plot: Musical special in which the Pieten try to find the lost bag of Saint Nicolas, which is used to carry the presents for the children. This special episode features seven songs.

1.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 1
1.plot: Because it's been 11 months since the Pieten have last been doing their work for the children, saint Nicolas orders Hoofdpiet to refresh their memory.

2.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 2
2.plot: When saint Nicolas seems to have left his ring in Spain, Hoofdpiet goes into the town to get a new ring.

3.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 3
3.plot: When Hoofdpiet breaks his leg a man pretends to be a doctor. He makes up the excuse to take Hoofdpiet into his home.

4.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 4
4.plot: Wout promises to give the saint a letter from Hoofdpiet. Wout, however, rips the letter apart and sends a letter of his own.

5.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 5
5.plot: Wout proposes to do an exchange: if saint Nicolas does what Wout asks him to, he will let Hoofdpiet go.

6.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 6
6.plot: Saint Nicolas receives another assignment from Wout. The assignment is a concealment for Wout's actual intention: stealing Amerigo, the horse of saint Nicolas.

7.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 7
7.plot: When the Pieten are distracted by his diversion Wout manages to kidnap Amerigo.

8.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 8
8.plot: Four children find Amerigo in the warehouse of Wout. Jacobien is locked in the candy storage when trying to steal some marzipan.

9.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 9
9.plot: When the children try to take Amerigo for a walk it scares when Hoofdpiet accidentally drops something fragile.

10.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 10
10.plot: Amerigo finds his way back to the castle of saint Nicolas.

11.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 11
11.plot: Many bakeries help saint Nicolas to reach the amount of candy needed.

12.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 12
12.plot: Wout manages to steal the entire amount of candy made by the bakeries by hijacking the train carrying the candy.

13.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 13
13.plot: When Wout gives another riddle the Pieten come to the conclusion that they have to fish in the canal around the castle.

14.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 14
14.plot: The Pieten have two hours to find the last letter before a rope bursts above it that holds an opened bottle of oil making the letter unreadable.

15.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 15
15.plot: Jaap and Jacobien arrive too late in the basement and the letter is smudged.

16.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 16
16.plot: Saint Nicolas goes searching with Jacobien and Jaap but the search for Hoofdpiet seems to lead to nothing.

17.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 17
17.plot: The three friends find Hoofdpiet in a brick factory but are unable to enter the room that contains Hoofdpiet.

18.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 18
18.plot: In a team effort the Pieten succeed in retrieving Hoofdpiet and return to Slot Marsepeinstein.

19.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 19
19.plot: Sinterklaas and Hoofdpiet go back to the brick factory to find Wout.

20.title: De Letterkoekjesbrief: Part 20
20.plot: Not only Hoofdpiet but also Fleur has seen that Wout can be a good guy. Fleur thinks of a way that Wout can make up for the trouble and the saint accepts.

 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 1
1.plot: A new school year starts at the Piet Academy. Sister Jacobien and brother Jaap befriend a fellow student called Guusje. Because Jaap skips class he is not welcome during dinner and sneaks into the kitchen of Bakpiet.

2.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 2
2.plot: Jaap found out there may be someone out to poison saint Nicolas. He tries everything in his power to make sure the candy that may have been poisoned is disposed of.

3.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 3
3.plot: Despite being sick Jaap goes to class to try and protect saint Nicolas. Jacobientje and Guusje break a rule by opening a cabinet that contains all student registrations, for a private issue.

4.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 4
4.plot: Tony pulls a prank by losing a wire during stunt course. Hoofdpiet pulls Guusje from being student representative because saint Nicolas thinks the task demands too much of her.

5.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 5
5.plot: Jaap tricks Lachpiet to be able to have a look in his agenda. Jacobientje creates an excuse to leave class in order to follow Lachpiet to his appointment.

6.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 6
6.plot: Smartpiet creates waterproof communication devices for use on the roofs. Jacobientje and Jaap trick Smartpiet to gain access to the secret library.

7.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 7
7.plot: By stealing the security key of Smartpiet, Jaap and Jacobientje hope to gain access to the bedroom of Lachpiet of which their effort fails. The following night they find a map of the academy in the hollow part of a tree.

8.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 8
8.plot: Jaap and Jacobientje find a new comrade in Tony. The three confront saint Nicolas with the map but he does not believe that there are secrets hidden in the castle nor that there is a conspiracy against him.

9.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 9
9.plot: The addition of Guusje makes the team a total of four. Hoofdpiet announces that the students will be send on a survival camp for a few days.

10.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 10
10.plot: The Pieten prepare for the boot camp but also have their own plan to make sure saint Nicolas is and stays safe.

11.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 11
11.plot: Lachpiet is the only teacher to go on boot camp with the students, much to the reluctance of the four friends. When Lachpiet makes dinner for the campers three of the four refuse to eat.

12.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 12
12.plot: Lachpiet catches the Pieten with the lost compass. Tony acts as if he breaks his ankle to make sure he gets send back to the academy, but fails when he jumps up to save Jacobientje after hearing her scream for help.

13.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 13
13.plot: Bakpiet replaces Lachpiet when he goes back to the academy for private matters. When Jacobientje gets sick she too has to go back to the academy.

14.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 14
14.plot: The four students are punished for their actions and have to perform special tasks when they get back to the academy. Smartpiet splits all students in his class in pairs to practice with gadgets for use on the roofs.

15.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 15
15.plot: The four Pieten argue whether they want to continue with the investigation surrounding a possible plot against saint Nicolas.

16.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 16
16.plot: Jacobientje searches through the room of Lachpiet and gets caught in the act. JP tries to befriend Guusje but seems to fail in the attempt.

17.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 17
17.plot: Sinterklaas announces that the Pieten are allowed to take a day off. While the four friends continue their search through the labyrinth, Hoofdpiet goes fishing with JP.

18.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 18
18.plot: Smartpiet and Swingpiet finish decorating the great hall for the prom. Jacobientje locks JP in his bedroom because she thinks he might mess up their plans.

19.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 19
19.plot: Guusje, Jaap and Tony try to find their way out of the labyrinth with outer help from Jacobientje. Smartpiet confronts Lachpiet with the disappearance of Hoofdpiet.

20.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 20
20.plot: JP and Hoofdpiet are freed from the bedroom. Guusje, Jaap and Tony find their way out of the labyrinth. All teachers and students celebrate the end of the school year.

1.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 1
1.plot: In assignment of saint Nicolas Jaap and Jacobientje go to the train station to take the train to Spain, they have to buy many oranges. Halfway Jaap surprises Jacobientje by convincing her to take the boat.

2.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 2
2.plot: A new school year starts at the Piet Academy. The lessons get spiced up when the old Hoofdpiet is replaced by a new person. The four want to be told more about the society, but not only Lachpiet is hesitant.

3.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 3
3.plot: Every Piet of the four receives a letter concerning the society. They have to be in the secret chamber exactly at midnight.

4.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 4
4.plot: Jacobientje, Guusje, Tony and Jaap get busted by Hoofdpiet on their way to the secret chamber but Guusje saves them with a lie. Once there saint Nicolas explains the four might become the successors of the teachers.

5.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 5
5.plot: Three of the four are not confident they can assume their new positions in the society. Smartpiet tries to keep the four's attention in class but fails in doing so.

6.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 6
6.plot: Lachpiet refuses to believe he is at the point where he needs a successor within the society. The four find an answer before the deadline despite their struggle. Guusje might not arrive on time because Lachpiet locks her in his room.

7.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 7
7.plot: Guusje, Jacobientje, Jaap and Tony enter the society. Hoofdpiet complains they are not involved enough with the academy.

8.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 8
8.plot: The four Pieten start in the society. Lachpiet counteracts the point of view of both Hoofdpiet and saint Nicolas concerning the chosen pupils.

9.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 9
9.plot: Saint Nicolas agrees with the test Lachpiet offered. JP jeopardizes the test when he wants to find Jacobientje whatever it takes.

10.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 10
10.plot: Saint Nicolas allows the unaware Hoofdpiet to punish the four for something they did not commit because the saint thinks telling the truth might imperil the society.

11.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 11
11.plot: Lachpiet confesses to saint Nicolas he locked the door of the secret chamber. The saint is very upset because his horse Amerigo could be in great peril because of this.

12.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 12
12.plot: Swingpiet, Bakpiet, Ruiterpiet and saint Nicolas are trapped in the storage space where Amerigo was found.

13.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 13
13.plot: A helicopter, the colossal steamboat and a submarine - all with complete crew - are send out to find Swingpiet, Bakpiet, Ruiterpiet and saint Nicolas. Tony struggles with what is more important: his education or the search.

14.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 14
14.plot: When Lachpiet talks to himself he confesses letting Amerigo loose and the four hear him. When they confront him he confesses he did it on purpose to prevent the old society from being replaced.

15.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 15
15.plot: All of the four are almost suspended until Guusje lies it was all her fault. When Lachpiet finds out Guusje got in trouble he confronts the saint with the truth.

16.title: De Pietenacademie: Part 16
16.plot: The Pieten pass their exams. They get an official function as Piet and claim their position within the society.

locations: Castle Poucke, Poeke, Aalter, Meetjesland, East Flanders, Belgium::(castle of saint Nicolas)
imdb.title: Slot Marsepeinstein
plot: On the Piet Academy young students are being educated to be a full fledged Black Piet. The teachers include Hoofdpiet (Headpiet), Swingpiet, Bakpiet (Bakepiet), Stuntpiet, Lachpiet (Laughpiet), Zangpiet (Singpiet) and Smartpiet.
